CharacterStoryDesc: The earlier injuries have left your memory a bit fuzzy. Take a walk with Watanabe—maybe you'll remember something.
To confirm the Iron Army's location, you and Watanabe set out to investigate.
All relevant clues have been gathered. Start organizing the intel and pinpoint the Iron Army's location.
The Iron Army's location has been deduced. Time to continue our journey.
All signs suggest the Iron Army will likely pass through Rusty Yoke. Let's head there.
Rusty Yoke lacks food and supplies, while the Iron Army is hiding in its impenetrable fortress. We must find a way to break their defenses.
All relevant clues have been gathered. Start organizing the intel and formulate a plan to attack the Halo Fortress.
After resolving the town's crisis, you decide to use the Army's wanted posters to coordinate an attack from both the inside and outside of the fortress to seize it.
Watanabe starts a prison riot, and the rebel forces' final assault on the Halo Fortress is about to begin.
The earlier injuries have left your memory a bit fuzzy. Take a walk with the Death Knight—maybe you'll remember something.
Guided by the Death Knight, you start to recall how you met her.
Time to fulfill your promise. Charge into Hell with the Death Knight and settle old scores with Witch Haida.
After entering Hell, two of you encounter Cerberus, who is fighting alone. The Death Knight immediately joins the battle and leads the demon army in a counterattack.
Witch Haida summons the waters of the Acheron River to flood Gray Raven and the Death Knight. In the freezing water, bizarre and dazzling visions flash before their eyes.
Countless memory fragments flood your mind. Sort through the information about the current state of Hell.
After awakening from the Acheron River, the two of you arrive beneath Atlantis, preparing to infiltrate the enemy's lair.
After spotting the two of you, Witch Haida begins to flee frantically through the fortress, sparking a high-speed chase.
Atlantis is like an ever-shifting maze. Before pursuing further, sort through the information.
Witch Haida is likely waiting for the Omega Egg to hatch. Though you don't know what will come out of it, if you want to stop the angels' invasion of Hell, you must stop her here.
The earlier injuries have left your memory a bit fuzzy. Work with Wanshi to investigate the village while organizing the intel you have on hand.
With Wanshi's guidance, you recall why you signed the contract with him.
After the train heist ends, you and Wanshi head to the orphanage he founded to investigate the source of the calamity.
On the way to the orphanage, Wanshi shares the information he has gathered over the years of investigation.
Not long after you discover the black-robed priest's corpse, swarms of Living Dead surround you in the forest. To break free and grant them release, Wanshi lifts his weapon once again.
Wanshi uncovered numerous clues from the corpses of the Living Dead, all pointing toward a far greater secret lurking behind this mystery.
Wanshi begins examining the dried corpses in the forest, but in one soul he unexpectedly sees an old acquaintance.
Wanshi and Gray Raven enter the cocoon woven by Uriel, where the ceaselessly pulsing amber reveals memories that once belonged to the Cardinal Deity.

Uriel hopes Wanshi will merge with the Cardinal Deity's memories and become the Sanctuary's new god. But Wanshi, having once been saved by human kindness, refuses a path that would drag the Three Realms into endless war. Enraged, Uriel reaches for the cocoon's power to crown himself, and a great battle is about to begin.
For now, you can't recall how you first met this woman named Lilith, but she swears loyalty to the Bloodsworn. Learn more about her as you make your way toward the town.
As you talk along the road, the reason you forged a covenant with Lilith gradually comes back to you.
As you near Whitehorse, you find that most nearby villages have been looted by angels hunting for gold coins. To put a stop to their rampage, the two of you decide to fight.
From the angels, you gather scraps of intelligence about Madam Raphael. When pieced together with what you already know, you can roughly deduce her goal and her next move.
In Whitehorse, the townsfolk have formed a militia and are clashing fiercely with the angel Executors. Lilith and Gray Raven throw themselves into the battle as well.
At the gates of City of No Return, a host of angels under Madam Raphael's command gathers. On demon soil, war between angels and demons is about to erupt.
Lilith swallows Mammon's Key and ascends as the new Golden King. In this reborn City of No Return, even an Archangel is no match for her.
Gray Raven and Morigan become trapped in the Infinite Illusion Realm. Guided by a nameless ghost, they begin searching for a way out.
With Morigan and the ghost's help, Gray Raven gradually begins to grasp the rules of the Infinite Illusion Realm.
After escaping the illusion, Gray Raven wagers both the crown of the Famine Knight and their very soul in one final gamble against Lilith.
